input.sentences: the trip to this fabolous restaurant had me in awe fro the moment that we walked up .
it is so busy outside | that sometimes you can not hear yourself talk .
the design of the buildings are simply a piece of art .
i was excited to taste genuine cuisine from this master chef .
i loved the various statues that the restaurant had displayed in the window .
output.sentences: We decided to walk to the restaurant during our trip.
It was difficult to talk or hear in the busy streets.
We made it, I can't wait to try my first piece.
I enjoyed getting a taste of genuine local cuisine prepared by a master.
I looked at the beautiful statues the restaurant keeps in the windows afterwards.
